questions_and_notes: Shouldn't this have a different standard name?  Is this the difference between the area_fraction at the end and beginning of the year?  Possible standard names: area_fraction_change (units: %) or area_fraction_tendency (units: % s-1).  Is this variable needed if fracLut-tpt-z0-hxy-x (fracLut-Eyr) is provided?
cell_methods: area: mean where land over all_area_types time: sum
long_name: Annual Gross Percentage That Was Transferred into This Tile from Other Land-Use Tiles
comment: Cumulative percentage transitions over the year; note that percentage should be reported as a percentage of atmospheric grid cell
